The patient randomize one two type PICC line . All line place identical technique . This include sterile technique , placement via vein upper arm use ultrasound guidance , position catheter tip fluoroscopic guidance . A database catheter place kept . Records review 1 week , 30 day , 60 day Interventional Radiology Fellow.Review include length time catheter place , whether treatment complete , whether catheter remove prematurely , clinical reason removal , result image test , result culture catheter remove suspicion infection . Any non-infectious complication relate catheter also note . The reviewer blind catheter use procedure .
